entry.title: A Note on Public Communication
entry.summary: The context discusses the issue of public communication and the potential death of a list due to an off-topic email. The list seems to be the most accessible way for people to search history and implement ideas proposed in the present for future use. However, with only one moderator checking emails once a week, many emails are being held, causing the list to become inactive. The author expresses concern about losing the two properties that the list provides if they change communication tools. Despite this, the author is open to changing communication tools if these properties can be retained.
